items.title: Cook + Movie Night
items.desc: Pick a simple recipe, then a comfort movie; debrief over dessert.

items.title: Craft & Chat
items.desc: Bring a simple craft (origami, sketching) and hang out.

items.title: Board-Game Café
items.desc: Low-rules games like Sushi Go!, Just One, or Azul.

items.title: Wine + Cards
items.desc: Light card games (Skull, LAMA) with snacks.

items.title: Trivia Pack
items.desc: DIY trivia (category rounds) + blind snack tasting.

items.title: Co-op One Shot
items.desc: A 45-min co-op like The Crew or Forbidden Island.

items.title: Sunset Walk
items.desc: Pick a scenic loop; finish with gelato or hot chocolate.

items.title: Photo Quest
items.desc: List 10 shots to capture; compare albums after.

items.title: Micro-Geocache
items.desc: Find one cache; celebrate at a nearby café.

items.title: Playlist Potluck
items.desc: Everyone brings 3 tracks; vote a vibe winner.

items.title: Open-Mic Scout
items.desc: Check a local open mic or jazz night.

items.title: Gallery + Dessert
items.desc: Quick exhibit walk, then a dessert debrief.

items.title: Bookstore Roulette
items.desc: Each grabs a zine/book under $15 and shares a gem.

items.title: Neighborhood Bites
items.desc: Two small plates across two spots; compare faves.

items.title: Night Views
items.desc: Find a skyline spot; bring a speaker for low volume.

items.title: After-Hours Games
items.desc: Short party games (Just One, Spyfall, Wavelength).
